Package game.board

package game.board
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    The `Board` class represents a chess board and provides methods for making moves, managing game state, and interacting with bitboards.
    FEN
    The FEN class represents operations related to the Forsyth-Edwards Notation (FEN) in a chess game.
    GameState
    The GameState class represents the current state of a chess game, including turn information, captured pieces, en passant, castling rights, and other relevant details.
